Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class LocationsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.LocationsController
@Controller public class LocationsController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with Locations.
Since:
2/1/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • showLocationsList

      @RequestMapping("/locations") public String showLocationsList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the locations to the "locations" model and redirects user to the locations page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "locations"

    • showCarriersList

      @GetMapping("/add-location") public String showCarriersList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Locations location, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-location page
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      location - Stores the information on the location
      result - Ensures the user inputs are valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-location"

    • addLocation

      @RequestMapping("/addlocations") public String addLocation(@Validated Locations location, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a location to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the location is saved in the locationsRepository. and the user is redirect to /locations
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-location page.
      Parameters:
      location - Stores the information on the location
      result - Ensures the user inputs are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/locations" or "/add/add-location"

    • deleteLocation

      @GetMapping("/deletelocations/{id}") public String deleteLocation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, redirects to the confirmation page Makes sure there are no dependencies before deleting. If there are, an error message is displayed
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the location to be deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/locations"

    • deleteLocationConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletelocationconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteLocationConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, deletes the location and redirects to locations page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the location being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/locations"

    • viewLocation

      @GetMapping("/viewlocation/{id}") public String viewLocation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that location to the locations page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the location to be viewed
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "locations"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editlocations/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that location to a form and redirects the user to that update form. Also adds the contractors to the form.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the location to be edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-location"

    • updateLocation

      @PostMapping("/updatelocation/{id}") public String updateLocation(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Locations location, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a location to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the location is updated in the locationsRepository. and the user is redirected to /locations
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-location page.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the location to be updated
      location - Stores the information on the location
      result - Ensures the user inputs are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/locations" or "/update/update-location"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
